Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage.
The Kohli vs. Shaheen Afridi battle was highlighted as a key contest.
Head-to-head statistics show India has won two matches and tied one against Afghanistan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Arun Jaitley Stadium has been a dominant venue for India, with a history of 14 wins each for teams batting first or second.
The match is part of the World Cup 2023, adding significance to the clash.
